results.prompt: Analyze this chart or scientific diagram in detail. Describe axes, labels, units, legends, trends, and embedded text. Be comprehensive and accurate.
results.output_text: number of paraphrases in the following diagrams.

results.prompt: Provide a technical description. Identify text, numbers, symbols, axes ranges, and structural elements. Be precise and systematic.
results.output_text: the number of paraphrases on the model.

results.prompt: Create a comprehensive caption suitable for academic documentation. Include visible text, chart elements, data patterns, and context.
Structured analysis: (1) main elements, (2) text/labels, (3) data patterns/trends, (4) overall purpose.
results.output_text: a number of parabolas and other parts of a base

results.prompt: Describe with high precision. Focus on exact text, numbers, symbols, and spatial relations. Avoid speculation; only observable facts.
results.output_text: the number of paraphrases on the model.
